name: Slime Age: Parody MMORPG Clicker
description:
The slime era has arrived!

Slimes have captured all locations and hold valuable loot for adventurers!

Which slime catches your fancy? Classic pink, slime-dog, or cat slime? Or perhaps slime-panda?

Collect loot, uncover endearing characters, and explore locations in this clicker game parody.

A game for people who like slimes and cute catgirls!
